thread.title: Detroit News prep football picks: Week 7
thread.title_full: Detroit News prep football picks: Week 7

author: detroitnews.com
title: Detroit News prep football picks: Week 7
text:
Detroit Country Day travels to Brother Rice this week. (Photo: Jose Juarez, Special to Detroit News) 
David Goricki, Rod Beard, James Hawkins and Craig Yuhas of The Detroit News offer their picks for Week 7 of the high school football season.
Canton at Plymouth 
Goricki: Canton
Beard: Canton
Hawkins: Canton
Yuhas: Plymouth
Detroit Country Day at Brother Rice 
Goricki: Country Day
Beard: Country Day
Hawkins: Country Day
Yuhas: Country Day (best bet)
DETROIT NEWS
Goricki's prep picks: Freshman leads Catholic Central
Howell at Brighton 
Goricki: Brighton
Beard: Brighton
Hawkins: Brighton
Yuhas: Howell
Farmington Hills Harrison at Farmington 
Goricki: Harrison
Beard: Harrison
Hawkins: Harrison
Yuhas: Harrison
Detroit Cody at Detroit East English 
Goricki: East English (best bet)
Beard: East English
Hawkins: East English
Yuhas: East English
Livonia Churchill at Livonia Franklin 
Goricki: Churchill
Beard: Churchill
Hawkins: Churchill
Yuhas: Churchill
Northville at Novi 
Goricki: Northville
Beard: Northville (best bet)
Hawkins: Northville
Yuhas: Northville
Detroit Jesuit at Warren De La Salle 
Goricki: De La Salle
Beard: De La Salle
Hawkins: De La Salle
Yuhas: De La Salle
Trenton at Wyandotte 
Goricki: Wyandotte
Beard: Trenton
Hawkins: Trenton
Yuhas: Trenton
River Rouge at Notre Dame Prep 
Goricki: River Rouge
Beard: Notre Dame Prep
Hawkins: River Rouge
Yuhas: River Rouge
Warren Mott at Sterling Heights Stevenson 
Goricki: Stevenson
Beard: Mott
Hawkins: Stevenson
Yuhas: Stevenson
Walled Lake Central at Walled Lake Western 
Goricki: Western
Beard: Western
Hawkins: Western
Yuhas: Western
Utica Eisenhower at Chippewa Valley 
Goricki: Chippewa Valley
Beard: Chippewa Valley
Hawkins: Chippewa Valley
Yuhas: Chippewa Valley
Port Huron at Romeo 
Goricki: Romeo
Beard: Romeo
Hawkins: Romeo (best bet)
Yuhas: Romeo
Grosse Pointe South at Utica 
Goricki: South
Beard: South
Hawkins: South
Yuhas: Utica
RECORDS 
Goricki: 63-27 (10-5 last week) 6-0 best bets
Beard: 60-30 (9-6) 6-0
Hawkins: 61-29 (10-5) 6-0
Yuhas: 58-32 (9-6) 5-1
